title: Need help with video editing software! :(
body:
So I'm using a very old version of Sony Vegas (14.0) that I bought back in my freshman year of college, and while it gets the job done eventually, it crashes randomly all the damn time, sometimes softlocking my computer so I have to hard reboot and I lose like 10-20 minutes of work every time. I already messed around and gave it as much RAM as I can and maxed out the multithreading for my CPU, but it's not helping.

Are there any programs out there that are more stable with a similar interface or a shallow learning curve that anyone would suggest I look at? I'm working with 1-2 GB .avi files.
